overview:
## Discussion

You can set this value to true only if [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCapturePhotoOutput/isContentAwareDistortionCorrectionSupported] returns true.

Applying distortion correction to preserve natural-looking content may result in a small change in the field of view compared to what you see in [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureVideoPreviewLayer]. The amount lost or gained is content specific and varies from photo to photo.

Enabling this property requires a lengthy reconfiguration of the capture render pipeline, so set this property to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] before calling [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureSession/startRunning()] on the capture session.

# isContentAwareDistortionCorrectionEnabled

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the photo render pipeline can perform content-aware distortion correction.

## Declaration

```swift
var isContentAwareDistortionCorrectionEnabled: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

You can set this value to true only if [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCapturePhotoOutput/isContentAwareDistortionCorrectionSupported] returns true.

Applying distortion correction to preserve natural-looking content may result in a small change in the field of view compared to what you see in [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureVideoPreviewLayer]. The amount lost or gained is content specific and varies from photo to photo.

Enabling this property requires a lengthy reconfiguration of the capture render pipeline, so set this property to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] before calling [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureSession/startRunning()] on the capture session.

## Determining available settings

- **isContentAwareDistortionCorrectionSupported**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the session’s current configuration supports content-aware distortion correction.
- **isLensStabilizationDuringBracketedCaptureSupported**: A Boolean value indicating whether the capture output currently supports lens stabilization during bracketed image capture.
- **maxBracketedCapturePhotoCount**: The maximum number of images that the photo capture output can support in a single bracketed capture.
- **supportedFlashModes**: A Swift array of flash settings this capture output currently supports.
- **isAutoRedEyeReductionSupported**: A Boolean value indicating whether the capture output supports automatic red-eye reduction.
